summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing acceptance of the 1994-1995 Conservation Futures Tax Levy proceeds from King County allocated for the Park Additions Project; authorizing the Mayor to amend the Interlocal Cooperation Agreement between the City of Seattle and King County authorized by Ordinance 114978; authorizing real property acquisition in the Park Additions Project; authorizing payment to the Trust for Public Land; and making an appropriation from the Conservation Futures Fund therefor.
